nodes.text: Captain Telanasi was an individual who served the New Republic as the commanding officer of the CR90 corvette Starlight Wanderer during the Galactic Civil War. In 5 ABY, Telanasi and the Starlight Wanderer participated in the Battle of Jakku, the final large-scale military engagement of the Republic and the Galactic Empire. During the battle, Telanasi stole a datapad from the Imperial Star Destroyer Eradicator which contained the locations of hundreds of secret Imperial military installations in the Unknown Regions. However, before Telanasi could share the information with the New Republic, the Starlight Wanderer was shot down and it crashed on the surface of the planet Jakku.
